data.title: Veteran Nollywood couple, Olu Jacobs and Joke Silva reveal how they have built their marriage on friendship and respect
data.meta_description: The respected couple in the movie industry gave an insight on how they have remained scandal free in the entertainment industry and how they have kept their relationship intact.
data.text:
Veteran Nollywood couple, Olu Jacobs and Joke Silva have revealed why they have remained scandal free as a celebrity couple.

The respected couple in the movie industry gave an insight on how they have remained scandal free in the entertainment industry and how they have kept their relationship intact.

Speaking, during a media interview, they disclosed that being friends and also having respect for each other, have been what has kept them together till date.

Joke Silve said: “Apart from being lovers, we are very good friends. We’ve learnt over the years to respect each other, and the respect keeps growing.”
